Title: ↩️ What is known about the case of Moldovan oppositionist Alexand...

Nesterovsky is accused of receiving money from the leader of the opposition Pobeda bloc, Shor. He faces imprisonment... What is known about the case of Moldovan oppositionist Alexander Nesterovsky: ▪️He is one of the leaders of the Revival party;▪️Nesterovsky was sentenced to 12 years in prison and a fine of $28 thousand in the case of illegal financing of a political formation;▪️He is accused of receiving money from the head of the opposition bloc 'Victory' Shor;▪️For several hours before the verdict was announced, Nesterovsky received Russian citizenship;▪️His lawyer claims that all the charges have no evidence base;▪️The deputy spoke out for strengthening ties between Chisinau and Moscow;▪️He is a co-author of bills on criminal liability for justifying fascism. He also advocated giving the Russian language official status; ▪️Shor stated that the Moldovan authorities would seek the imprisonment of Nesterovsky before the parliamentary elections in order to discredit the party’s cooperation with the Russian Federation.

Title: ↩️🎬 🚨 What is known about the dam break and flooding in Minusin...
Description: TASS: 🚨 A rupture of an earthen embankment occurred on the Minusinka River in the Krasnoyarsk Territory, there is a threat of flooding of 120 residential buildings, the Ministry of Emergency Situations reported. 🚨 What is known about the dam break and flooding in Minusinsk:▪️In Minusinsk, due to sudden warming, the dam was washed away from the Malaya Minusa settlement;▪️13 courtyards of residential buildings were flooded. As a preventive measure, 11 private houses in the area of ​​Mikhailova Street were de-energized;▪️22 people were evacuated, including six children;▪️Rescuers are conducting public awareness and door-to-door visits;▪️A temporary hydrological post has been set up. Two temporary accommodation points with a total capacity of 150 people have been prepared;▪️According to the prosecutor's office, traffic on the Minusinsk - Krasnoturansk highway is limited;▪️On the territory of Minusinsk and two village councils of the Minusinsk district - Novotroitsky and Malominusinsky - a high alert regime is in effect. Video: EMERCOM of the Russian Federation

Title: Fraudsters have invented a scheme to gain access to a SIM card an...
Description: Fraudsters have invented a scheme to gain access to a SIM card and mobile bank. The materials of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation, which TASS has reviewed, say that an unknown person calls the person and introduces himself as an engineer of a cellular operator company. Then the caller talks about the need to check the telephone line and asks to press, for example, #90, #09 or any other combination of numbers and symbols. When you press the combination, the scammers will gain access to the SIM card and will be able to make calls at the subscriber’s expense. Fraudsters will also be able to gain access to mobile banking, the Ministry of Internal Affairs emphasized.

Title: 🗣 Putin and Lukashenko held a press conference following the mee...
Description: 🗣 Putin and Lukashenko held a press conference following the meeting. The main thing from the statements of the Russian President on Ukraine:▪The Russian Federation agrees with proposals to stop hostilities, but leading to long-term peace and eliminating the causes of the crisis;▪Russia is for a truce, but there are nuances, including the Kursk region;▪In the Kursk region everything is under the full fire control of the Russian Federation. The exit of the Ukrainian military from encirclement becomes impossible;▪Ukraine benefits from achieving a truce for 30 days against the backdrop of the fact that all its military in the Kursk region are blocked;▪Ukraine can use the truce to obtain weapons or forced mobilization;▪The Russian Armed Forces are advancing almost everywhere, it is unclear how the situation on the line of contact will be resolved in the event of a truce;▪Putin thanked Trump for his attention to the settlement Ukraine;▪The President of the Russian Federation said that he could call Trump and discuss the idea of ​​a truce;▪The idea of ​​a truce is correct, but there are issues that need to be discussed, including with the United States;▪Putin called the desire of foreign leaders to help end hostilities in Ukraine a noble mission. The main thing from the statements of the President of Belarus:▪Ukrainians, when returning to negotiations after three years, must understand that the situation on the ground has changed;▪Ukrainians should have ceased fire long ago and sat down at the negotiating table;▪Neither Russia nor Belarus were the cause of the conflict in Ukraine;▪If Russia comes to an agreement with the United States, then the 'pipe' is for Ukraine and Europe combined.

Description: TASS: A criminal case has been opened against actor Gleb Kalyuzhny after he failed to show up at the point of departure for military service, law enforcement officers told TASS. The location of Kalyuzhny has not been established, the agency’s interlocutor clarified. Gleb Kalyuzhny had no grounds for a deferment from military service at the time he received the summons. Law enforcement agencies reported this to TASS. Earlier it became known that a criminal case had been opened against the actor under the article on evasion of military service. He faces up to two years in prison.

Macron’s statements are divorced from life and contradict previous ones every day, the diplomat noted.
